ConversationApiLog.name: ConversationApiLog
ConversationApiLog.description: Logs of an API operation on a specific conversation object done using the Conversation Service API.

Action.description: The specific action performed using the Conversation Service API.

Operation.description: Name of the operation that triggered the Conversation Srevice API log.

OwnerId.description: Owner ID that triggered the Conversation API log.

RequestedById.description: The User ID that triggered the Conversation API log.

RequestedDate.description: The date of the operation that triggered the Conversation API log.

RequestedEntityIdentifier.description: The entity ID being created, updated, or deleted.

RequestedEntityType.description: The type of entity being created, updated, or deleted.

Status.description: The status of the Conversation API operation.
